title: #31 - That Episode About Polyamory with Margaret French
description:
This week, we dig into the topic of polyamory...

Yup, throuples! Or, as Maria calls it: “a trinity”.

This week’s guest, Margaret French, met her husband Cody five years ago. Just nine months later, they would meet their to-be girlfriend Janie.

After coming out on social media, they now share insights into their unique life online to help educate those interested in the world of polyamory.

Maria and Margaret have a fascinating conversation and answer YOUR questions about how this relationship works!

Read the New York Times article Maria talked about

author: maria@agapematch.com (Maria Avgitidis)
